section.heading: Applicability.
section.text: This subchapter shall only apply to a covered loan as defined in § 26-1151.01(7)(A).

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 201 of Home Loan Protection Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-295, March 1, 2002, 49 DCR 2534).
